backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented features, related source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of frontend file summaries describing UI structure, state management, utilities, and new description‑based logging flow.
frontend/CLEAN_REDEPLOY.md: Guide outlining steps for performing a clean rebuild and redeploy of the frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind‑based style definitions with OKLCH dark theme variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the app root and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Regression testing checklist covering layout, navigation, widgets, pages, and data persistence.
frontend/scripts/clean-rebuild.sh: Shell script that removes build artifacts, reinstalls dependencies, runs type checks, and rebuilds the project.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling page state, theme setup, and rendering pages with bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar component defining six page tabs and handling navigation clicks.
frontend/src/components/LiveCalendarWidg: Live time and date widget that updates every second and displays formatted time and full date.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching a backend actor, reacting to identity changes, and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider to manage Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend query hooks are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base, custom theme variables, utility classes, and layout styles for the app.
frontend/src/lib/calories.ts: Calculates calories burned for gym and cardio using DeepSeek AI with MET-based fallback and exports the user profile.
frontend/src/lib/deepseek.ts: Implements DeepSeek API calls for exercise and nutrition data, including calorie calculations and structured responses.
frontend/src/lib/descriptionFlow.ts: Parses free‑text descriptions into structured entries using DeepSeek when available with heuristic fallback.
frontend/src/lib/indianNutrition.ts: Empty module reserved for Indian nutrition data.
frontend/src/lib/mealPromptParser.ts: Parses multi‑item meal text into structured food items using pattern matching and portion estimation.
frontend/src/lib/nutrition.ts: Provides nutrition lookup via online API, DeepSeek AI, or local database with fallbacks and scaling by quantity.
frontend/src/lib/onlineNutrition.ts: Fetches nutrition data from Open Food Facts, extracts per‑100g values, and scales them to the given quantity.
frontend/src/lib/portionEstimates.ts: Converts portion units into gram estimates using default and food-specific mappings.
frontend/src/lib/store.ts: Defines Zustand store for daily study, gym, and food tracking data with actions and persistence.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders dashboard showing daily progress for study, gym, nutrition, calories, and goals.
frontend/src/pages/Description.tsx: Parses user descriptions into structured entries, enriches them, and saves gym or food data to the store.
frontend/src/pages/Goals.tsx: Displays daily goals with progress, auto-tracked status, and manual checkboxes, plus a toggle for school attendance.
frontend/src/pages/Gym.tsx: Shows today's gym stats and logged activities, with calories, muscles trained, and an option to add workouts via description.
frontend/src/pages/Nutrition.tsx: Presents daily nutrition totals and food entries with calories, macros, and a button to add meals via description.
frontend/src/pages/Study.tsx: Manages study topics with add, status updates, and categorized progress (done, pending, later).
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and theming for the app's UI.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, features, issues, and requirements for enhancing nutrition parsing and lookup workflows.
